message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but that's a bit steep for me. Would you consider $90?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you have a bottom line Alice, but I'm on a tight budget.  Could we meet in the middle at $100?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can meet you at $105, but that's the last time I can budge on the price.
